perturbation.original_text:
WHEREAS, PAPA JOHN’S desires to acquire the right to use the Celebrity Endorsement (as defined below) in connection with the
advertisement, promotion and sale of PAPA JOHN’S Products (defined below) and ABG agrees to grant such rights to PAPA JOHN’S and provide
the services of CELEBRITY, all subject to the terms and conditions of this Agreement;
perturbation.changed_text:
WHEREAS, PAPA JOHN’S desires to acquire the right to use the Celebrity Endorsement (as defined below) in connection with the
advertisement, promotion and sale of PAPA JOHN’S Goods (defined below) and ABG agrees to grant such rights to PAPA JOHN’S and provide
the services of CELEBRITY, all subject to the terms and conditions of this Agreement;
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'Products' to 'Goods' introduces ambiguity. While 'Products' is defined in the agreement, 'Goods' is not. This creates uncertainty about the scope of the endorsement, potentially leading to disputes over what items the Celebrity Endorsement applies to.

perturbation.original_text:
D.
“Products” shall mean PAPA JOHN’S-branded pizza, bread sides, and, subject to ABG’s Approval in each instance,
piadinas and desserts (excluding pastries, doughnuts, coffee and coffee-based products, energy drinks, ‘hydration’ frozen ice bars, ‘energy’ frozen
ice bars, and ‘recovery’ frozen ice bars), in each case produced and sold by PAPA JOHN’S.
perturbation.changed_text:
D.
“Items” shall mean PAPA JOHN’S-branded pizza, bread sides, and, subject to ABG’s Approval in each instance,
piadinas and desserts (excluding pastries, doughnuts, coffee and coffee-based products, energy drinks, ‘hydration’ frozen ice bars, ‘energy’ frozen
ice bars, and ‘recovery’ frozen ice bars), in each case produced and sold by PAPA JOHN’S.
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'Products' to 'Items'. Products were explicit and defined. By changing this to 'Items', we make the term vaguer. Are services included? Merchandise?

perturbation.original_text:
ABG shall require CELEBRITY to post on each of CELEBRITY’s Instagram (the page located at
www.instagram.com/shaq and Personality’s Instagram account (@shaq)), Twitter (the page located at www.twitter.com/shaq and Celebrity’s Twitter
account (@shaq)), and Facebook (the page located at www.facebook.com/shaq) at least one post (1) per month promoting Papa John’s Products.
perturbation.changed_text:
ABG shall require CELEBRITY to post on each of CELEBRITY’s Instagram (the page located at
www.instagram.com/shaq and Personality’s Instagram account (@shaq)), Twitter (the page located at www.twitter.com/shaq and Celebrity’s Twitter
account (@shaq)), and Facebook (the page located at www.facebook.com/shaq) at least one post (1) per month promoting Papa John’s offerings.
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'Products' to 'offerings'. Again, explicit vs. potentially more vague. Are the offerings just food? could it be 'deals?'
